description.0: An ancient longbow that is a remnant of King Deshret's ancient era. An indecipherable ancient text and solemn patterns have been carved into it.

0.0: After a Charged Attack hits an opponent, a Sunfire Arrow will descend upon the opponent hit, dealing <cryo>60%</cryo> ATK as DMG, and applying the Heartsearer effect to the opponent damaged by said Arrow for 10s. Opponents affected by Heartsearer take <cryo>28%</cryo> more Charged Attack DMG from the wielder. A Sunfire Arrow can be triggered once every 10s.
